# sankey-playground
https://sankey-playground.now.sh

## Examples

These are examples generated with my [gnucash-to-sankey.ts](https://gist.github.com/jguddas/fed12202b775a7a1ce21e61c550dd347) script allowing you to visualize cashflow.
